plurals.name: alert_dialog_exit_ecm
plurals.item: The phone will be in the emergency callback mode for %s minutes. No apps that require network connection can be used in this mode. Exit now?
The phone will be in the emergency callback mode for %s minute. No apps that require network connection can be used in this mode. Exit now?

plurals.name: alert_dialog_not_avaialble_in_ecm
plurals.item: Unable to perform the selected action in emergency callback mode. The phone will be in the emergency callback mode for %s minutes. Exit now?
